@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cute+Font&display=swap');

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Meddon&display=swap');

.woaf-image {
    border: solid 2px #011C30;
    width: 85%;
    margin: auto;
    margin-bottom: 1em;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5);
    border-radius: 500px;
    background: #011C30;
}

.woaf-holder {
    border-radius: 15px;
    border: outset 2px #888;
    margin: 10px 0 15px;
    padding: 0 20px;
    background: rgb(235,235,235);
}

.woaf-holder.list p:first-of-type
.woaf-holder > .second-list p:first-of-type {
    text-align: center;
    font-style: italic;
    margin-top: 0;
    font-size: 80%;
}

.woaf-holder h1,
.blockquote h1 {
    text-align: center;
}

.academics h1 {
   font-family: 'Meddon', cursive;
   margin-bottom: 0;
}

.doom h1 {
    font-family: 'Cute Font', cursive;
    font-size: 3em;
    margin-top: .3em;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.anastasis h1 {
    font-family: 'Major Mono Display', monospace;
}


.amore h1 {
    font-family: 'Love Light', cursive;
    margin: 0;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
    font-size: 2.2rem;
    font-weight: unset;
}

.creditRate {
float: unset !important;
margin-bottom: unset !important;
}
